SignInPage.title: Sign in to Chronicle
SignInPage.subtitle: Select a method below to sign in or create an account
SignInPage.error: An error occurred during login, please try again or use another login method.
SignInPage.failedToLoad: Failed to load login options, please refresh the page and try again.
